hadith.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by al-Jariri to the same effect though a different chain of narrators. Abu Dawud said:'Abd al-Wahhab al-Thaqafi did not mention the name of Abu Sa'id. Hammad b. Salamah said: From al-Jariri, from Abu al-'Ala', from the Prophet (ï·º). Abu Dawud said: The hearing of this tradition by Hammad b. Salamah and Thaqafi is of the same nature
